about_the_game:
Sudoku originated from the Latin square studied by Swiss mathematician Euler and others in the early 18th century, and this game, "Minimalist Sudoku," is likely the best Sudoku game you can find for seamless controller play.

Sudoku initially was a number-filling game that used paper and pencil for calculations. Players need to deduce the numbers for all remaining empty cells on a 9×9 grid based on the given numbers, ensuring that each row, each column, and each of the nine 3×3 subgrids contain all digits from 1 to 9 without repetition.

Game Features:

  • Supports standard Sudoku and Killer Sudoku.

  • Perfectly supports controller play, allowing for two-player cooperative fun.

  • Launches with over 100 challenging puzzles, with more levels to be updated later.

  • Supports Steam cloud saves, instantly recording players' star-level challenge achievements.

  • Allows importing custom Sudoku puzzle libraries, automatically saving them to cloud storage for unlimited, anytime, anywhere enjoyment of any Sudoku puzzle.

  • Permits mid-game exits, fully saving the intermediate gameplay state.

  • Minimalist gameplay interface with various user-friendly icon prompts.

  • Affordable price.

  • 5 lively and elegant ambient music tracks.

  • Ideal for playing on TVs, with the best handheld experience.
